name: @luxiaobei1/planet-postcss-prefixwrap

1.19.9.name: @luxiaobei1/planet-postcss-prefixwrap
1.19.9.description: A PostCSS plugin that is used to wrap css styles with a css selector to constrain their affect on parent elements in a page.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-only
scripts.build-only: tsc --build ./tsconfig.json && rm -rf ./build/{**/*,*}.spec.js && rm -rf ./build/acceptance && rm -rf ./build/integration && npm run copy
scripts.pub: npm run build && npm run pub-only
